alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Fremont, northeastern Jefferson, western Madison and southeastern Clark Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 635 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Monteview to near Teton. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rexburg, Ashton, Dubois, Marysville, Lorenzo, Sugar City, Teton, Parker, Hamer, Archer, Egin, St Anthony, Chester, Ashton Reservoir, Monteview, Plano, Small, Sage Junction, Newdale and Thornton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
